title: UBS launches heavily discounted Costa Group recap
text:
Berries, citrus and tomato grower Costa Group is cap in hand in front of shareholders.

After one week with its shares not trading, broker UBS launched the deal on Monday night.

Costa was seeking to raise $176 million at $2.20 a share via a one-for-four entitlement offer to existing investors.

The price represented a 31 per cent discount to the theoretical ex-rights price and a 36.4 per cent discount to the last traded price, according to terms sent to fund managers.

The deal was underwritten by UBS.

Funds raised would be used to repay debt.
description: Berries, citrus and tomato grower Costa Group is ready to go cap in hand to investors.
